app.heading: Sudoku Solver
app.how-to-content: This website is a fast Sudoku solver where the result is calculated directly on your device. To get the solution for a Sudoku puzzle, simply enter all known numbers into the following form and press Solve! In case you only want to know the next number, press Next Number.
reset-dialog.title: Reset
reset-dialog.content: Are you sure that you want to reset the Sudoku puzzle?
sudoku-box.unsolvable-content: There is no valid solution for the Sudoku puzzle that you just entered!
sudoku-box.form-invalid-snack-bar-messag: Some of the entries are not valid or exclude each other! The Sudoku puzzle can only be solved when all entries are valid.
